skills.name: aiconfig-create
skills.description: Guide for setting up AI configuration in your application. Helps you choose between agent vs completion mode, select the right approach for your stack, and create AI Configs that make sense for your use case.
skills.compatibility: Requires LaunchDarkly API access token with ai-configs:write permission or LaunchDarkly MCP server.

skills.name: aiconfig-projects
skills.description: Guide for setting up LaunchDarkly projects in your codebase. Helps you assess your stack, choose the right approach, and integrate project management that makes sense for your architecture.
skills.compatibility: Requires LaunchDarkly API access token with projects:write permission or LaunchDarkly MCP server.

skills.name: aiconfig-tools
skills.description: Guide for giving your AI agents capabilities through tools. Helps you identify what your AI needs to do, create tool definitions, and attach them in a way that makes sense for your framework.
skills.compatibility: Requires LaunchDarkly API token with ai-tool permissions.

skills.name: aiconfig-update
skills.description: Update, archive, and delete LaunchDarkly AI Configs and their variations. Use when you need to modify config properties, change model parameters, update instructions or messages, archive unused configs, or permanently remove them.
skills.compatibility: Requires LaunchDarkly project with AI Configs enabled and API access token.

skills.name: aiconfig-variations
skills.description: Guide for experimenting with AI configurations. Helps you test different models, prompts, and parameters to find what works best through systematic experimentation.
skills.compatibility: Requires LaunchDarkly API access token with ai-configs:write permission.

skills.name: create-skill
skills.description: Add a new skill to the LaunchDarkly agent-skills repo. Use when creating a new SKILL.md, updating the skills catalog, and aligning with repo conventions.
skills.compatibility: Works in repositories following the Agent Skills open standard

skills.name: launchdarkly-flag-cleanup
skills.description: Safely automate feature flag cleanup workflows using the LaunchDarkly MCP server. Use when removing flags from code, cleaning up stale flags, assessing removal readiness, or creating PRs that preserve production behavior.
